name: MindControl (KhashayarJan)
description:
Mind Control

A top down shooter where you can shoot to kill enemies, but you can also control their mind so they kill each other. 

Remember:

  • Only weak enemies can be controlled (their health becomes purple).
  • Healers don't need to be weakened and can be controlled even if they are at full health.
  • Using MindControl Orb costs your health so choose carefully who to control.
  • Levels Finish when there are no enemies left on the level.
  • Do not hurt the pets.
  • If you die, wait for the tune (around 4 sec) then press any key to restart level

Controls:

Use arrow keys to move, space to shoot and CTRL to throw MindControl Orbs at enemy. Esc to exit the game. Press Insert to go to next level.

Inspired by:

NimbleQuest

&

Handkerchief

🇮🇷Made in Iran🇮🇷

#Potensh
